Quickstride narrows his eyes and puts his ears aback.

" Then why the pit =
did ya start on Rattrap when ya know damn well that you are in the company =
of Maximals?  That was dumb on your part."
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "=
adamsafran" <adamsafran@...> wrote:
>
> 
> > Quickstride steps onto the pla=
te and slams a hoof down on the ground.
> > 
> > " THAT'S ENOUGH!  IT'S ONE=
 THING TA PICK A FIGHT WITH THE BIG GUYS BUT WHEN YA PICK ON SOMEONE WHO'S =
MUCH SMALLER THAN YOU, THAT'S WHERE I DRAW THE LINE!  NOW DO AS HYDRAS SAYS=
 AND KEEP YOURSELF IN LINE!  GEESH!  TALK ABOUT A PERPETUAL PEST!"
> > 
> >=
 He then looks to Leo Prime.
> > 
> > " Sorry for the outburst, Sir but Din=
obot's conduct is pushing my buttons the wrong way.   I heard the whole thi=
ng and he's the one who started on Rattrap.  Straight Shot spoke up because=
 she's sticking up for him, and personally, I don't blame her.  She would n=
ot have acted defensively if she had not been harassed.  " 
> > 
> 
> There=
 was a snorted laugh from DINOBOT, "Oh, pick on her?  When I had a trio of =
Maximals threatening to assault me for merely making optic contact with her=
?"  Remaining easily on his feet from the shake and quake, but his weapon r=
emained away.  "Does this awareness extend to others of your own organizati=
on, or do you all think in one mind, and each given to one immediately spre=
ads out to the others?"
> 
> The Predacon at total ease.  "And so you stick=
 up for the one who threatened to attack me after I saw the one who had me =
killed in the first place.  Is that how you Maximals are?  My faction right=
 or wrong?  No wonder you have left Cybertron in such a wretched state, for=
 your own blindness to everything, and regardless of circumstances your tot=
al blame of every event upon another and a denial fo your own responsibilit=
y."
> 
> DINOBOT's sneer continuing, but still no making threatening moves.=
  "Does the Rodent still enjoy shooting his friends in the back and taking =
his gun so he can take their personal belongings?"
>
